page.title: 02OUR SCHOOL
page.content: Most of the children in our class went to either{Beetley C.P.School}(founded in 1895),or{Gressenhall V.A.School (founded by the squire John David Hay Hill in 1842).Both schools closed in July 1983 because the buildings were old and overcrowded. We all liked our old schools very much, there were not so many rules because there were fewer children and they were more friendly places because everybody knew each other. We started coming to our present school in September 1983. It is called St.Mary's after the churches of both villages.It has got over 170 children, aged from 5-11 years. There are 8 teachers on the staff,including one headteacher, and two part timers.It has 6 classrooms,a library and a hall.
